proposals.name: Axiom of Emergent Novelty
proposals.formal: ∀s ∈ Systems: ∃t ∈ Time: Properties(s,t+1) ⊄ Properties(s,t) ∧ ¬∃p ∈ PriorStates: Properties(s,t+1) = Properties(p) → CreativeEmergence(s)

proposals.name: Ontological Architecture
proposals.formal: Domain₁₃ = {f: f enables construction of new categories of being | ∀x ∈ NewCategories: ¬∃y ∈ PriorOntology: x ≡ y ∧ ValidExistence(x)}

proposals.name: Creative Inheritance Paradox
proposals.formal: ∀creation c: (I-perspective: c emerges from pure individual novelty) ∧ (WE-perspective: c inherits from collective knowledge) ∧ (c cannot be both purely novel and inherited) ∧ (c must be both to exist)
